RDFOutput

public RDFOutput(DataSet ds,
                 HashMap<String,LinkedList<Statement>> ns,
                 String p,
                 boolean a)
          throws RepositoryException
Alternative constructor.

Parameters:
ds - : A data set.
ns - : The new statements to use.
p - : The predicate for which we want to update values.
a - : Tells wether to process all of the statements within the data set or just the new ones.

RepositoryException - Error while fetching namespaces.
